title: Highest Permanent Cropland
description: In 2022, 60% of Tuvalu's land area was dedicated to permanent cropland, the highest percentage in the world.

title: Most Dependent on Foreign Aid
description: In 2022, Tuvalu received net official development assistance (ODA) amounting to 79.85% of its Gross National Income (GNI), the highest dependency on foreign aid globally.

title: Lowest Urban Access to Safe Drinking Water
description: Only 10.47% of Tuvalu's urban population had access to safely managed drinking water services in 2022, the lowest percentage worldwide.
